name: flame-wheel
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
An attack that may
cause a burn.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
An attack that may
cause a burn.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A fiery charge attack that
may inflict a burn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A fiery charge attack that
may inflict a burn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user makes a
fiery charge at the
foe. It may cause
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user cloaks
itself in fire and
charges at the foe.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.
